Tony's lamentation, or, Potapski's city-case being his last farewel to the consecrated Whigs : the tune is, Let Oliver now be forgotten.
1 broadside
Printed for VV. Griggs ..., London : 1682.
In verse. With music. "Satire on the Earl of Shaftsbury"--NUC pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
